mapper.select: SET LOCK_TIMEOUT 10000; SELECT CHEKSTD.CHS_SORT, CHEKSTD.FAC_CODE, CHEKSTD.CHS_NO, CHEKSTD.CHS_CODE, CHEKSTD.CHS_GUBN, CHEKSTD.CHS_GUBN_DETAIL, CHEKSTD.CHS_HANG, CHEKSTD.CHS_KIJUN, CHEKSTD.CHS_MIN, CHEKSTD.CHS_MAX, CHEKSTD.CHS_DANW, FACILITY.FAC_NO, CHEKSTD.CHS_IMG, FACILITY.FAC_NAME, FACILITY.FAC_GYU, FACILITY.TECH_NO, FACILITY.TECH_NO, TECHIN.TECH_HT, CHS_CHKMETHOD, CHS_STEPMETHOD FROM CHEKSTD WITH(NOLOCK) INNER JOIN FACILITY WITH(NOLOCK) ON CHEKSTD.FAC_CODE = FACILITY.FAC_CODE INNER JOIN TECHIN WITH(NOLOCK) ON TECHIN.TECH_NO = FACILITY.TECH_NO ORDER BY FAC_NAME,CHS_GUBN,CHS_SORT, CHS_NO, FAC_CODE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHEKSTD ( CHS_CODE, CHS_NO, FAC_CODE, CHS_SORT, CHS_GUBN, CHS_GUBN_DETAIL, CHS_HANG, CHS_KIJUN, CHS_MIN, CHS_MAX, CHS_DANW, CHS_CHKMETHOD, CHS_STEPMETHOD ) VALUES ( (SELECT ISNULL(MAX(CHS_CODE), 0) + 1 FROM CHEKSTD), (SELECT ISNULL(MAX(CHS_NO), 0) + 1 FROM CHEKSTD), #{fac_code}, #{chs_sort}, #{chs_gubn}, #{chs_gubn_detail}, #{chs_hang}, #{chs_kijun}, #{chs_min}, #{chs_max}, #{chs_danw}, #{chs_chkmethod}, #{chs_stepmethod} )
mapper.update: UPDATE CHEKSTD SET CHS_NO = #{chs_no}, FAC_CODE = #{fac_code}, CHS_SORT = #{chs_sort}, CHS_GUBN = #{chs_gubn}, CHS_GUBN_DETAIL = #{chs_gubn_detail}, CHS_HANG = #{chs_hang}, CHS_KIJUN = #{chs_kijun}, CHS_MIN = #{chs_min}, CHS_MAX = #{chs_max}, CHS_DANW = #{chs_danw}, CHS_CHKMETHOD = #{chs_chkmethod}, CHS_STEPMETHOD = #{chs_stepmethod} WHERE CHS_CODE = #{chs_code}
